chat_history.message: Hello, My iPhone 12 mini has a problem: I need to cancel the order and although it hasn't been shipped yet, it won't let me cancel it. Thank you,

Dear ecomobile

This customer made a mistake when purchasing the order and now she needs to cancel the order.

Please, do not send this device, instead, refund the order.

We'll be waiting for your updates.

Regards,
Sara from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We have contacted our logistics partner about the cancellation of the order. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

The order has been successfully cancelled and the customer has been refunded.

Regards,
JY
